LanguageData.ImprovedSleepingSpot.label: basic mat
LanguageData.ImprovedSleepingSpot.description: A simple wooden mat for resting and emergencies. Not very comfortable, but quick to build.

LanguageData.RJW_RoyalBed.label: luxurious double bed
LanguageData.RJW_RoyalBed.description: An elegant gold-inlaid double bed, this model is sometimes used in high-end bordellos. Comfy and beautiful.
